mapper.sql: attachment_id, attachment_name, attachment_url,attachment_type,business_module, attachment_size, business_type, business_id,group_id company_id, operator_id, create_time, update_time, is_delete
mapper.insert: insert into t_attachment_record (attachment_name, attachment_url,attachment_type, business_module,attachment_size, business_type, business_id, company_id,group_id, operator_id, create_time, update_time, is_delete) values (#{attachmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessModule,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{attachmentSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=SMALLINT})

mapper.update:
update t_attachment_record
attachment_name = #{attachmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attachment_url = #{attachmentUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_module=#{businessModule}
attachment_type=#{attachmentType}
attachment_size = #{attachmentSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
business_type = #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_id = #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where attachment_id = #{attachmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_attachment_record set attachment_name = #{attachmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment_url = #{attachmentUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment_type = #{attachmenType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_module = #{ businessModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment_size = #{attachmentSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, business_type = #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_id = #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where attachment_id = #{attachmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select attachment_url from t_attachment_record where business_id = #{archiveId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_delete=0 AND group_id IN (SELECT group_id FROM t_attachment_group WHERE group_name = #{groupName} AND is_delete = 0)
mapper.update:
update t_attachment_record set is_delete=1 where attachment_id in
#{item}
mapper.select:
SELECT record.attachment_id as attatchmentId, arc.user_name as userName, arc.employee_number as employeeNumber, org.org_name as orgName, orga.org_name as businessUnitName, record.create_time as creatTime, record.attachment_url as attatchmentUrl, substring_index(substring_index(record.attachment_url,'/',2) , '/', -1) as fileType, concat(substring_index(record.attachment_url, '/', 1),'#',substring_index(record.attachment_url, '/', -1)) as fileName FROM t_user_archive arc left join t_attachment_record record on record.business_id=arc.archive_id and arc.is_delete=0 left join t_organization org on arc.org_id = org.org_id and org.is_enable=1 left join t_organization orga on arc.business_unit_id = arc.org_id and orga.is_enable=1 WHERE record.business_id in(select employment_id from t_pre_employment where org_id in
#{item} ) AND record.company_id = #{companyId} AND record.is_delete = 0 group by fileName
select attachment_number from t_attachment_group where group_name=#{groupName} and group_type='GROUP'
mapper.update:
update t_attachment_record set is_delete=1 where company_id=#{companyId} and attachment_id in
#{item}
mapper.select: SELECT record.attachment_id as attatchmentId, arc.user_name as userName, arc.employee_number as employeeNumber, org.org_name as orgName, orga.org_name as businessUnitName, record.create_time as creatTime, record.attachment_url as attatchmentUrl, substring_index(substring_index(record.attachment_url,'/',2) , '/', -1) as fileType, record.attachment_name as fileName FROM t_user_archive arc left join t_attachment_record record on record.business_id=arc.archive_id and arc.is_delete=0 left join t_organization org on arc.org_id = org.org_id and org.is_enable=1 left join t_organization orga on arc.business_unit_id = arc.org_id and orga.is_enable=1 WHERE business_id=#{preId} AND record.company_id = #{companyId} AND record.business_type = #{businessType} AND record.is_delete = 0 group by fileName
